item.title: Commercial RO Water Purifier Plant/Filter
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: Fully automatic shut off function which automatically switched off the Machin when its water tanks get full || Purification Technology : RO : Type : Electrical, Purification Stage :Stage 1: 5 microns inline PP filter || Stage 2: Granule Active Carbon Filter ||Stage 3: Block Active Carbon Filter || Stage 4: RO Membrane ||Stage 5: […]
item.content:encoded:
• Fully automatic shut off function which automatically switched off the Machin when its water tanks get full || Purification Technology : RO : Type : Electrical, Purification Stage :Stage 1: 5 microns inline PP filter || Stage 2: Granule Active Carbon Filter ||Stage 3: Block Active Carbon Filter || Stage 4: RO Membrane ||Stage 5: Post Carbon Filtration
  • Best ro water purifier for Domestic and Commercial use with TDS Adjuster (that helps to adjust the taste of water as per the source)
  • Purification Capacity: 50 Liter Per Hour,2 pcs 150 Gpd Booster Pump, 4 pcs membrane
  • RO Water Purifier System Which runs upto 3000 TDS level of Input Water from Both Groundwater and Munciple Supply
  • Max. duty cycle per day: 400 To 500 Ltr, Suitable for Office, Restaurant, Cafe, Resort and Factory

item.title: SMART Mini Water Dispenser
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: Technical Specifications — Model: 28 (TABLE TOP) No. of Faucets — 3 Machine Dimensions (mm) — 320*370*530 Package Dimensions (mm) — 355*405*585 Net Weight (kg) — 1.7 Gross Weight (kg) — 13.2 Cold Storage Capacity (liters) — 3.5 Power Source — 220V/1P/50Hz Power Cold (Max.) watts — 140 Power Hot (watts) — 540 Refrigerant — […]
item.content:encoded:
• Technical Specifications — Model: 28 (TABLE TOP)
  • No. of Faucets — 3
  • Machine Dimensions (mm) — 320*370*530
  • Package Dimensions (mm) — 355*405*585
  • Net Weight (kg) — 1.7
  • Gross Weight (kg) — 13.2
  • Cold Storage Capacity (liters) — 3.5
  • Power Source — 220V/1P/50Hz
  • Power Cold (Max.) watts — 140
  • Power Hot (watts) — 540
  • Refrigerant — R 134 a CFC Free
  • Cooling Capacity (liters per hour) — 3
  • Condenser — Static
  • Heating Capacity — Less than equal to 90 degree celcius, 5L/Hrs.

item.title: SMART ALKALINE RO
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: Transparent water Storage tank. Water storage tank 13 Liters. Dual Mode Hanging / Table Top as per your convenience. LED indicators to check system status. This system is also available with white colour storage tank. ABS food grade storage tank and cabinet quality. Also comes with optional TDS control.
item.content:encoded:
• Transparent water Storage tank.
  • Water storage tank 13 Liters.
  • Dual Mode Hanging / Table Top as per your convenience.
  • LED indicators to check system status.
  • This system is also available with white colour storage tank.
  • ABS food grade storage tank and cabinet quality.
  • Also comes with optional TDS control.

item.title: NATURAL ALKALINE RO
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
• Alkaline Filter Cartridge which maintains water pH Level.
  • Ozone Cleaner for Fruits & Vegetables.
  • Direct Drinking Cold water available with the cooling capacity of 0.8 liters.
  • Ready to use Boiling Hot water for tea & coffee with the heating capacity of 1 Itr.
  • LED Display Screen to Monitor Machine Status.
  • Nine stage Water filtration : 2-in-1 pre filter, Carbon Filter, RO/UF Membrane, Alkaline, -ORP, Hydrogen Rich, UV, Minerals.
  • TDS & Hot water Temperature Display on Screen.
  • Triple mode - Table top / Wall Hanging / Cabinet fit.
  • Intelligent Membrane Flushing System.
  • Child Lock for Hot water Dispensing.
  • Inbuilt 7 litres Pure water storage.
item.content:encoded:
• Alkaline water with negative ORP
  • Hot water any time
  • Normal cold drinking water
  • Fruits & vegetables detoxified
  • Led display for TDS & temperature
  • Built in pre-filter
  • 100% UV in pure water tank
  • Aqua revive technology

item.title: SCIENTIFIC ALKALINE IONIZER
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
• Low Alkaline 8-9 pH - Use for drinking.
  • Mid Alkaline 9-10 pH - Use for drinking 1or 2 glass in a day.
  • High Alkaline 10-11 pH - Use for cooking.
  • Beauty water 5-6 pH - Use for face wash.
  • Filtered water 6-7 pH - Use for taking medicine.
  • High acidic 3-4 pH - Use for cleaning.
  • Hot water upto 900 - Use for making tea & coffee.
item.content:encoded:
• 5 Plates titanium chamber
  • Digital touch panel
  • pH level maintainable
  • Via bluetooth mobile operation
  • Alkaline water with negative ORP
  • Hot water any time
  • Fruits & vegetables detoxified
  • Led display for TDS & temperature
  • 100% UV in pure water tank
  • Aqua revive technology
